snippet: Mike Condon was 10 years old the last time Ottawa got a win in Chicago. Yup, it had been that long....
lead_paragraph: Mike Condon was 10 years old the last time Ottawa got a win in Chicago. Yup, it had been that long.

headline.main: Senators Beat Blackhawks 4-3 for 3rd Straight Win
headline.print_headline: Senators Beat Blackhawks 4-3 for 3rd Straight Win
